name: Lost Jump
description:
A CHALLENGING platformer game , in it you can't jump ! , instead you use a variety of abilities to get threw the various obstacles in your way , gaining more abilities along the way of restoring your jumpibility .

CONTROLS :-

WASD/LEFT STICK : MOVE

SPACE BAR/A : DASH

LEFT SHIFT/RIGHT SHOULDER: CLIMB

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON/LEFT SHOULDER : HOVER

VERY IMPORTANT NOTE : have fun :D (and don't rage quit)
